title: Legal Notice
description: Legal notice for breach of contract, cheque bounce, etc.

template.heading: UNDER THE INSTRUCTIONS AND ON BEHALF OF:
NOTICE
template.content: TAKE NOTICE that I am acting as Advocate for [ClientName] (hereinafter referred to as 'my client') in the matter mentioned below:

template.heading: DEMAND
template.content: My client hereby demands that you [Demand] within [TimeLimit] days from the receipt of this notice, failing which my client shall be constrained to initiate appropriate legal proceedings against you for recovery of the said amount along with interest and costs.

template.heading: CONSEQUENCES
template.content:
TAKE FURTHER NOTICE that if you fail to comply with the above demand within the stipulated time, my client will be left with no alternative but to seek appropriate legal remedy available under law, and in such an event, you shall be liable for all costs and consequences thereof.

[Consequences]
